import React from 'react' import "../static/style.css" export default function FlipCard(props) {; let {movieObj,vote_average,genreid,handleRemoveFromWatchList,name,watchList,poster_path} = props; const popularity = Math.round(movieObj.popularity); const rating = Math.round(movieObj.vote_average*10)/10; return ( <> {/*Create the filter card and return with respective Data*/}

{movieObj.title}

{genreid}

{popularity}

{rating}

) }
